troubleshooting.title: Payment Failure
troubleshooting.shortdesc: What to do if your payment for a booking or subscription fails.

condition.title: Applies to all platforms and payment methods.
condition.p: You see a payment error message or transction is declined.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: Invalid payment detail, insufficient funds, or payment gateway downtime.

step.cmd: Verify your card or payment account details.
Ensure you have sufficient funds or credit available.
Try a different payment method if possible.
If the issue continues, contact your bank and inform support.
